title: MERN
description: MERN stands for MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js. It is a modern stack that uses a combination of modern frameworks and a no sql database to ensure you spin up your webapp as quickly as possible.

title: MEAN
description: MEAN stands for MongoDB, Express.js, Angular, and Node.js. It is one of the most used tech stacks but requires a slightly higher learning curve than our MERN stack.

title: LAMP
description: LAMP stands for Linux, Apache, MySQL, and PHP. It is a classic open-source web development stack that provides a robust environment for deploying dynamic websites and web applications.

title: MEVN
description: MEVN stands for MongoDB, Express.js, Vue.js, and Node.js. It is a full-stack JavaScript solution with the Vue.js frontend framework, making it easier to create modern web applications with JavaScript on both the client and server.
